H0.text: To which family of trees do junipers belong. Pine

H1.text: To which family of trees do junipers belong. Fir

H2.text: To which family of trees do junipers belong. Spruce

H3.text: To which family of trees do junipers belong. Cypress

A4.text: The family includes 27–30 genera (17 monotypic), which include the junipers and redwoods, with about 130–140 species in total.

A5.text: Cupressaceae or the cypress family is a family of conifers.
